Posts.Content: Nov 6, 2011 07:20AM - edited Nov 6, 2011 07:26AM by SoulSista This is great feedback...so much appreciated with all the confusion around this topic.  My oncotype score was 11 and my risk of distant recurrence was 7%.  I think I read in this study that 3-6 drinks/wk increases risk by 15% so that means my 7% goes up to 8%?
